text:
Daredevil is a fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. The character is commonly known by such epithets as the "Man Without Fear" and the "Devil of Hell's Kitchen", and is the alias of Matt Murdock, who is blind, but sees more than any seeing person. After Pushing an old man out of the way of a car, he gets hit and radioactive chemicals get into his eyes and blind him, but also give his other senses super powers. Super hearing, boosted touch sensitivity, smell and taste. He lives in Hell's Kitchen, a fictional place in New York. His friends are Foggy Nelson and Karen Page. He has also met The Punisher, Iron Fist, Jessica Jones, Luke Cage and the group the Hand. His first appearance in a comic was "Daredevil" #1. He was created by Stan Lee and Bill Everett.
Portrayal.
Matt Murdock was played by Ben Affleck in the 2003 movie "Daredevil". Most recently he was played by Charlie Cox in the Marvel Television productions "Daredevil" and "The Defenders" on Netflix, set in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. He later made a cameo in a deleted scene of Elektra. Cox is reportedly set to reprise his role of the character in the upcoming ' sequel starring Tom Holland in 2021.
